description: Tool for arithmetic operations on 2D images, pixel-by-pixel

datum_type.title: Output Datum Type
datum_type.description: Coerce the output data to be stored as the given type: byte, short, or float. Default is the datum of the first input image on the command line.

image_inputs.title: Input Image Files
image_inputs.description: Read image 'dname' and call the voxel values 'a' in the expression. 'a' may be any letter from 'a' to 'z'. If some letter name is used in the expression but not present in one of the image options here, then that variable is set to 0.

expression.title: Expression
expression.description: Apply the expression within quotes to the input images, one voxel at a time, to produce the output image. (e.g., "sqrt(a*b)" to compute the geometric mean)

output_name.title: Output Image Filename
output_name.description: Use 'name' for the output image filename. Default is 'imcalc.out'.
